description: Stunning duplex-style townhouse built by Polygon and impeccably maintained. This 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath corner unit features a bright open-concept design with extra windows for natural light. The spacious dining area opens onto a large deck perfect for entertaining. Additional highlights include a side-by-side garage and private fenced yard. Enjoy resort-style amenities with a clubhouse, exercise room, outdoor pool, and hot tub. Fantastic central location close to parks, schools, and more.
